tool.name: Convert genome coordinates
tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
Make sure that the genome build is specified for the input dataset (click the pencil icon if it is not specified).
-----
**What it does**
This tool converts genome coordinates and annotation files between assemblies and genomes. It outputs 2 files, one containing all the mapped coordinates and one containing the unmapped coordinates (if any).
-----
**Example**
Running this tool to convert the following hg16 intervals into hg18 intervals::
chrX 85170 112199 AK002185 0 + chrX 110458 112199 AK097346 0 + chrX 112203 121212 AK074528 0 -
will return the following hg18 intervals::
chrX 132991 160020 AK002185 0 + chrX 158279 160020 AK097346 0 + chrX 160024 169033 AK074528 0 -
